resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81411</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81411</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Designing an Anti-skid Device for Footwear</string>
            <string language="es">Diseño de un dispositivo antideslizante para calzado</string>
            <string language="ga">Gléas Frith-sciorrtha a Dhearadh do Bhróga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzipieren einer rutschfesten Einheit für 
Fußbekleidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concevoir un dispositif antidérapant pour des 
chaussures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projetando um dispositivo antiderrapagem para 
calçados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progettazione del dispositivo antisdrucciolevole 
per calzatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός μιας αντιολισθητικής συσκευής για τα 
υποδήματα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Project involving the design and construction of an external device that can be attached to footwear in icy conditions in order to prevent skidding and slipping.</string>
            <string language="es">Proyecto para diseñar y crear un dispositivo externo que pueda ser aplicado a calzado en condiciones de hielo para evitar el deslizamiento y el resbalamiento.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal chun gléas seachtrach a dhearadh agus a thógáil ar féidir a cheangail le bróga nuair atá sioc amuigh chun sciorradh a sheachaint.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technology</string>
            <string language="es">Tecnología. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Teicneolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projizieren Sie das Mit.einbeziehen des Designs 
und des Aufbaus einer externen Einheit, die zur Fußbekleidung in den 
eisigen Bedingungen angebracht werden kann, um Rutschen und Gleiten zu
verhindern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projetez comporter la conception et la 
construction d'un dispositif externe qui peut être attaché aux 
chaussures en conditions glaciales afin d'empêcher ensaboter et 
glisser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projete o envolvimento do projeto e da 
construção de um dispositivo externo que possa ser unido aos 
calçados em circunstâncias geladas a fim impedir derrapar e 
deslizar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proietti la coinvoluzione la progettazione e della
costruzione di un dispositivo esterno che può essere fissato a 
calzatura nelle circostanze ghiacciate per evitare che slittare e 
slitta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα που περιλαμβάνει το σχέδιο και την κατασκευή
μιας εξωτερικής συσκευής που μπορεί να συνδεθεί με τα υποδήματα 
στους παγωμένους όρους προκειμένου να αποτραπούν η ολίσθηση και η
ολίσθηση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
